CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Chronic Condition Patients}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Senior Care Group}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patient Satisfaction exceed 350 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {367.07} % in {1963}, total value was {353.01} % in {1961}, total value was {365.65} % in {1962}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patient Satisfaction fall between 324 and 358 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1968, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1969?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between {1962} and {1968} was {smaller} than between {1966} and {1969}.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1967, was the average total Patient Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1963 and 1965?
NC.A: The average total patient satisfaction between {1962} and {1967} was {higher} than between {1963} and {1965}.

NC.A: The average total patient satisfaction between {1963} and {1964} was {higher} than between {1961} and {1967}.

NC.A: The total patient satisfaction in {1961} was {higher} than in {1970}.
